subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Scott Rolen drove in three runs and Bronson Arroyo pitched a complete game to lead the Reds to a 7-2 victory that ended the Cardinals’ long run as the N.L. Central’s top team.
snippet: Scott Rolen drove in three runs and Bronson Arroyo pitched a complete game to lead the Reds to a 7-2 victory that ended the Cardinals’ long run as the N.L. Central’s top team.
